TopicTitle: Delta V Readout is Inaccurate During Ascent

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows | CPU: i7 | GPU: igpu | RAM: 16Gb

 

Sometimes during ascent, the dv readout decreases exponentially instead of linearly.

This occurs most often during kerbin ascent, with Methalox engines. It continues to occur in a vacuum, it does not occur when the stage is activated in a vacuum.

 

The craft used to make the graph had a core booster with 9 vectors, and it shows a clear rapid decrease as it runs out of fuel, and barely any decrease when full of fuel.

 

this makes planning missions and making manoeuvre nodes much harder than it should be.
